cheatsheet.title: Creating a new plot in Debrief

intro.description: This tutorial will lead you through creating a new, blank plot in Debrief.

item.title: Check you have a Project
item.description: Debrief requires working files to be contained in a Project (see Help for this item).

item.title: Create new plot
item.description: Select [File/New/Others/Debrief Plot] and follow the Wizard

item.title: Add background data
item.description: From the wizard, select what information you'd like shown in the background of the plot.
